item.title: Kenny and Kaylor Hope ‘Love Island USA’ Fans “Can Relate to Us More” in ‘Beyond the Villa’
item.description: The Peacock spinoff follows fan-favorite season six Islanders as they navigate life and love outside the ‘Love Island USA’ Villa.

item.title: ‘Love Island USA’ Stars Chelley and Ace on Dating Exclusively, Meeting Families and Shocking Dinner Elimination: ‘It Was Very Evident That’s What America Wanted’
item.description: As the final episodes of Season 7 of “Love Island USA” come to an end, only four couples remain in the villa. The long-awaited return of Family Day showed the remaining islanders reuniting
